alert.note: Alert for Butler; Clermont; Hamilton; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 15 at 9:00AM EDT until July 15 at 9:30AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Hamilton County in southwestern Ohio... Southeastern Butler County in southwestern Ohio... Northwestern Clermont County in southwestern Ohio... Central Warren County in southwestern Ohio... * Until 930 AM EDT. * At 900 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sharonville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Cincinnati, Hamilton, Middletown, Fairfield, Mason, Lebanon, Norwood, Forest Park, Sharonville, Monroe, Blue Ash, Loveland, Trenton, Springdale, Reading, Montgomery, Madeira, Wyoming, Milford and Deer Park. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 8 and 37. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 6 and 32. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
